statements: SELECT id, expense_category, expense_amount, income_source, income_amount FROM financial_tracking;
SELECT id, income_source, income_amount, expense_category, expense_amount FROM financial_tracking;
SELECT expense_amount, expense_category, id, income_amount, income_source FROM financial_tracking;
SELECT income_source, expense_category, income_amount, id, expense_amount FROM financial_tracking;
SELECT expense_category, expense_amount, income_source, id, income_amount FROM financial_tracking;
SELECT * FROM financial_tracking WHERE expense_category = 'Groceries';
SELECT id, expense_category, expense_amount FROM financial_tracking WHERE expense_amount > 1000 ORDER BY expense_amount DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT expense_category FROM financial_tracking;
SELECT income_source, SUM(income_amount) AS total_income FROM financial_tracking GROUP BY income_source ORDER BY total_income DESC;
SELECT expense_category, AVG(expense_amount) AS avg_expense FROM financial_tracking GROUP BY expense_category ORDER BY avg_expense DESC;
SELECT * FROM Expense WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT expense_type, amount FROM Expense ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT * FROM Income WHERE income_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM Expense
SELECT id, expense_type, expense_date FROM Expense
SELECT * FROM Expense WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY expense_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT expense_type, amount FROM Expense WHERE amount < 500 ORDER BY expense_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM Income WHERE income_source LIKE '%salary%' AND amount > 2000 ORDER BY income_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT expense_type, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM Expense GROUP BY expense_type HAVING total_amount > 500 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Expense e INNER JOIN Income i ON e.amount = i.amount WHERE e.expense_type = i.income_source ORDER BY expense_date ASC, income_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, category, amount FROM expenses WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM financial_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' AND report_date <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT source, SUM(amount) AS total_income FROM income GROUP BY source;
SELECT report_name, generated_by FROM financial_reports ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM expenses GROUP BY category;
SELECT * FROM income WHERE source = 'Salary' AND date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM financial_reports WHERE generated_by = 'Finance Team' ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT id, amount, category, date FROM expenses WHERE amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY category ASC, date DESC;
SELECT * FROM expenses;
SELECT expense_name, expense_amount FROM expenses ORDER BY expense_amount DESC;
SELECT income_source, income_amount FROM income WHERE income_amount > 1000;
SELECT category_name FROM category WHERE id = 1;
SELECT expense_name, expense_amount, expense_date FROM expenses WHERE expense_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY expense_amount ASC;
SELECT expense_name, expense_amount FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000 ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM income WHERE income_amount < 500 AND income_source LIKE 'Salary%';
SELECT category_name FROM category WHERE id IN (SELECT category_id FROM expense_category WHERE expense_id = 1);
SELECT expense_name, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM expenses GROUP BY expense_name HAVING SUM(expense_amount) > 500;
SELECT expense_name, expense_date FROM expenses WHERE expense_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY expense_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM expenses;
SELECT category, amount FROM expenses WHERE date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, type, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM categories WHERE category_name LIKE 'F%';
SELECT MAX(amount) AS highest_amount FROM income;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT category, SUM(amount) FROM expenses GROUP BY category HAVING SUM(amount) > 5000;
SELECT users.username, SUM(transactions.amount) AS total_amount FROM users INNER JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id GROUP BY users.username HAVING total_amount > 10000;

SELECT income.source, expenses.category, SUM(income.amount) AS total_income, SUM(expenses.amount) AS total_expenses FROM income LEFT JOIN expenses ON income.source = expenses.category GROUP BY income.source, expenses.category;
SELECT users.username, categories.category_name FROM users CROSS JOIN categories;
